name: Superball Sportsball
description:
Simple little game made for Mini Jam 86 - the theme was "Sports", and the limitation was "No stopping".

Made in one day rather than three because I forgot about the jam until the very last day... oops.

WASD controls player 1, arrow keys for player 2.

Might release a sequel with online multiplayer and a few options to spice it up... stay tuned.
